verbose_text: Because an induction of hepatic PPARalpha gene expression level could improve hyperlipidemia and hepatic steatosis, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR we speculated that genetic variants in the hepatic rs5767743 and rs5767700 loci may increase the PPARalpha gene expression level and subsequently ameliorate the development of a metabolic disorder, although a detailed mechanism still needs to be explored.
